title: The royal charter granted unto kings, by God himself and collected out of his Holy Word, in both Testaments / by T.B. ... ; whereunto is added by the same author, a short treatise, wherein Episcopacy is proved to be jure divino.
author: Bayly, Thomas, d. 1657?
notes: Attributed to Thomas Bayly. Cf. BM; erroneously attributed to Thomas Browne.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
